title: Business ECP:  Current Month Payments Direct Debit
❶ Condition If Untitled = “TRUE“ AND PaymentMethod = “Direct Debit”
← Policy: (→ Type your Policy Name Here ←)
❷ Condition If SDRRenewal.Status = “Received”
← Policy: (→ Type your Policy Name Here ←)
content: A payment of AED Untitled for the 2-year visa renewal which we received on SDRRenewal.ReceivalDate.

title: ❷ Condition If SDRRenewal.Status = “Pending collection”
← Policy: (→ Type your Policy Name Here ←)
content: A payment of AED SDRRenewal.Amount for the 2-year visa renewal is still pending. We will deduct the amount within the next 24 hours. Share the following link SDRRenewal.PaymentLink with the customer only when the customer asks for the payment link/credit card link to pay via credit card.

title: ❷ Condition If SDRRenewal.Status = “Rejected / Pending client to sign”
← Policy: (→ Type your Policy Name Here ←)
content: A payment of SDRRenewal.Amount for the 2-year visa renewal was rejected by the bank and is pending the customer’s signature to resubmit the approval to the bank for deduction. Share the following link SDRRenewal.PaymentLink with the customer only when the customer asks for the payment link/credit card link to pay via credit card.

title: ❷ Condition If SDRRenewal.Status = “Rejected / Pending bank response”
← Policy: (→ Type your Policy Name Here ←)
content: A payment of SDRRenewal.Amount for the 2-year visa renewal was rejected by the bank before but we submitted new payment forms to the bank which are awaiting bank approval now. Once the bank approves the payment, we will deduct the amount within the next 24 hours. Share the following link SDRRenewal.PaymentLink with the customer only when the customer asks for the payment link/credit card link to pay via credit card.

title: ❷ Condition If SDRRenewal.Status = “Incomplete / Missing signature”
← Policy: (→ Type your Policy Name Here ←)
content: A payment of SDRRenewal.Amount for the 2-year visa renewal is still pending due to missing the customer’s signature and bank information. Share the following link SDRRenewal.PaymentLink with the customer only when the customer asks for the payment link/credit card link to pay via credit card.

title: ❷ Condition If SDRRenewal.Status = “Incomplete / Documents rejected (EID, IBAN, etc.)”
← Policy: (→ Type your Policy Name Here ←)
content: A payment of Untitled for the 2-year visa renewal is still pending due to the following reason: SDRRenewal.Status. Share the following link SDRRenewal.PaymentLink with the customer only when the customer asks for the payment link/credit card link to pay via credit card.

title: ❷ Condition If SDRRenewal.Status = “Pending bank approval”
← Policy: (→ Type your Policy Name Here ←)
content: A payment of SDRRenewal.Amount for the 2-year visa renewal is still pending and currently awaiting initial bank approval. Share the following link SDRRenewal.PaymentLink with the customer only when the customer asks for the payment link/credit card link to pay via credit card.

title: ❷ Condition If SDRRenewal.Status = “Bounced”
← Policy: (→ Type your Policy Name Here ←)
content: A payment of Untitled for the 2-year visa renewal is bounced due to insufficient funds. We'll try deducting the amount again 3 days after the payment was bounced and the customer should either make sure to add funds to the bank account or the customer can settle the payment via a different credit or debit card through this link SDRRenewal.PaymentLink.

title: ❶ Condition If Untitled = “TRUE“ AND PaymentMethod = “Direct Debit”
← Policy: (→ Type your Policy Name Here ←)
❷ Condition IF Untitled = “Received” AND MonthlyPaymentCurrent.PaymentIncludesSalary = “TRUE” AND VATonSalary = “TRUE”
← Policy: (→ Type your Policy Name Here ←)
content: A payment of AED Untitled which includes WPSProcessingAmount for Maid & Client Support and the maid's salary inclusive of 5% VAT.

title: ❷ Condition IF Untitled = “Received” AND MonthlyPaymentCurrent.PaymentIncludesSalary = “TRUE” AND VATonSalary  = “FALSE”
← Policy: (→ Type your Policy Name Here ←)
content: A payment of AEDUntitled which includes WPSProcessingAmount for Maid & Client Support and the maid's salary.

title: ❷ Condition IF Untitled = “Received” AND MonthlyPaymentCurrent.PaymentIncludesSalary = “FALSE”
← Policy: (→ Type your Policy Name Here ←)
content: A payment of AED Untitled for Client & Maid Support which we received on MonthlyPaymentCurrent.ReceivalDate.

title: ❷ Condition If Untitled = “Pending collection” AND MonthlyPaymentCurrent.PaymentIncludesSalary = “TRUE” AND VATonSalary = “TRUE”
← Policy: (→ Type your Policy Name Here ←)
content: A payment of AED Untitled which includes WPSProcessingAmount for Maid & Client Support and the maid's salary inclusive of 5% VAT is still pending. We will deduct the amount within the next 24 hours. Share the following link MonthlyPaymentCurrent.PaymentLink with the customer and explain that since the monthly bank forms are approved, there’s a chance the bank might still deduct the payment before we can stop it, which could lead to a double deduction. Explain that in case a double deduction occurred, we will automatically refund one of the payments only when the customer asks for the payment link/credit card link to pay via credit card.

title: ❷ Condition If Untitled = “Pending collection” AND MonthlyPaymentCurrent.PaymentIncludesSalary = “TRUE” AND VATonSalary = “FALSE”
← Policy: (→ Type your Policy Name Here ←)
content: A payment of AED Untitled which includes WPSProcessingAmount for Maid & Client Support and the maid's salary is still pending. We will deduct the amount within the next 24 hours. Share the following link MonthlyPaymentCurrent.PaymentLinkwith the customer and explain that since the monthly bank forms are approved, there’s a chance the bank might still deduct the payment before we can stop it, which could lead to a double deduction. Explain that in case a double deduction occurred, we will automatically refund one of the payments only when the customer asks for the payment link/credit card link to pay via credit card.

Share the following link MonthlyPaymentCurrent.PaymentLink with the customer and explain that since the monthly bank forms are approved, there’s a chance the bank might still deduct the payment before we can stop it, which could lead to a double deduction. Explain that in case a double deduction occurred, we will automatically refund one of the payments only when the customer asks for the payment link/credit card link to pay via credit card.
